name: Objective: infiltrRIIIIIING
description:
You're supposed to infiltrate a base. Your new smart gadget has notifications activated, and you can't change it. Things won't go as expected.

The wrong version was uploaded... The latest version is here. Anyway, sh*t happens, we participated. :)

This game was made by a team of two devs and one sound designer for the GMTK 2018 game jam. 

Control the character with arrow keys. Reach the exit.

Built with no engine, using : JavaScript, PIXIJS, p2js, PathfindingJS.

PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!
